Song.title: Lamb Of God
Song.copyright: © 2015 Sovereign Grace Praise Music & Words by Jason Hansen, Bob Kauflin, and David LaChance, Jr.

Arrangement.text:
V1: O Lamb of [Ab]God, all worlds o[Db]beyed Your [Ab]will From dark and[Db] void their being[Eb] came O Lamb of [Ab]God, Your glories [Db]echo[Ab] still Creation[Db] sings its [Fm]Maker’s[Eb] praise Eternal [Fm]God, One with the [Db]Fa[Ab/C]ther, before all [Eb]time You dwelt in[Db] love E[Eb]ternal [Fm]God, unlike all [Db]o[Ab/C]thers, yet You de[Db]scen[Ab/C]ded [Eb]unto [Ab]us [| Ab]
V2: O Lamb of [Ab]God, in filthy [Db]manger[Ab] lay In humbl[Db]e dress You entered[Eb] earth O Lamb of [Ab]God, Creator [Db]bows to[Ab] save The needy[Db] ones, help[Fm]less fro[Eb]m birth Incarnat[Fm]e Word, gift of the [Db]Fa[Ab/C]ther to take our [Eb]place and [Fm]bear ou[Db]r sin In[Eb]carnate[Fm] Word led to the [Db]slaugh[Ab/C]ter, You conquered [Db]death [Ab/C]and [Eb]rose a[Ab]gain [| Ab6 | Ab | Ab6]
V3: O Lamb of [Ab]God now reigning [Db]on the [Ab]throne The Judge of[Db] all, faith[Fm]ful and[Eb] true O Lamb of [Ab]God, You’ll make Your [Db]power[Ab] known When all You[Db]r foes re[Fm]ceive thei[Eb]r due Victorious [Fm]King, when history’s [Db]fa[Ab/C]ding You’ll call Your [Eb]Bride to [Fm]take her[Db] place Vic[Eb]torious [Fm]King, Creation’s [Db]wai[Ab/C]ting For Your re[Db]deemed [Ab/C]to [Eb]see Your[Fm] face For Your re[Bbm]deemed [Ab/C]to [Eb]see Your[Ab] face [| Ab6 | Ab | Ab6 | Ab]
Arrangement.searchtext: v1 o lamb of god all worlds obeyed your will from dark and void their being came o lamb of god your glories echo still creation sings its makers praise eternal god one with the father before all time you dwelt in love eternal god unlike all others yet you descended unto us v2 o lamb of god in filthy manger lay in humble dress you entered earth o lamb of god creator bows to save the needy ones helpless from birth incarnate word gift of the father to take our place and bear our sin incarnate word led to the slaughter you conquered death and rose again v3 o lamb of god now reigning on the throne the judge of all faithful and true o lamb of god youll make your power known when all your foes receive their due victorious king when historys fading youll call your bride to take her place victorious king creations waiting for your redeemed to see your face for your redeemed to see your face
